h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai
content: Note that you do actually have the ability to change your decision later, in the Reignite the Sparks Menu, you’ll just need to move to the Relic Tab.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Note that you do actually have the ability to change your decision later, in the Reignite the Sparks Menu, you’ll just need to move to the Relic Tab.
